app.title: PREQUEL AI Filter Photo Editor
app.description:
Prequel is an all-in-one editor app with photo filters, video effects for Reels, and presets for your photos & videos. Be visually creative, in one tap and let followers feel your mood!

Vintage camera effects for pictures, retro photo filters and video filters, which you can use for your amazing Reels! Presets for your photos! And so many other video and photo editing tools! You will always achieve standout content with our unique app—with its fonts for text on photo, stickers, Vintage, Film, Cartoon, Grain, VHS, Anime, Y2K, and other video and photo filters and effects you can be visually creative, in one tap!

Prequel is a must-have app if you want to upgrade your photo and video editing pipeline, use more photo filters and effects, make your social media content fit a specific aesthetic, or just quickly give your casual pics and vids a more elevated look to boost your followers!

FILTERS FOR PHOTO & VIDEO

Over 200 Hollywood-quality photo and video filters for latest trends and popular aesthetics: WES, Dark, Teal Tone, Sepia, Black and White, Grain, Retro, Vintage, Anime, Y2K, and many more! (And that’s just the tip of the iceberg with our effects & filters for photo & video!) 

PHOTO & VIDEO EFFECTS

Cinematic, Retro, Film, Old Money, VHS, Lomography, and other VFX, frames, and camcorder emulators, as used by photographers and filmmakers who know a lot about effects for photos and videos!

ADJUSTMENTS

Market's best adjustments for working with color and light, including DOF, blurs, HDR, ultrasharp, midtone details, color density. Photo and video editing has never been easier!

BEAUTY TOOLS

Body and face editor features to perfect your look: works on photos and videos from your camera roll! Compliment the result with our presets and templates for photos, videos and Reels!

TEXT TOOL

Over 200 fonts for stories, highlights, and captions: the iconic subtitles, text behind objects, plus handwritten, basic, and contemporary fonts. Add text to photo on top of our filters, presets, or other tools and make your content even more attractive!

OVERLAYS, STICKERS, TEXTURES

Unlimited potential for further customization with 60+ curated texture overlays and 250+ hand-designed stickers on photo for your visuals! Use animated text stickers with your own custom text. Say what you want to say in style!

BATCH EDITING

Applying the same changes to up to 10 photos at the same time and saving edits as custom presets to reuse later. Save time on photo and video editing! Create presets out of edits with multiple filters and tools used!

BACKGROUND CHANGE

Incredibly easy, quick, and precise background replacement in photos for next-level creative expression!

THE GOLD SUBSCRIPTION

► Prequel Gold offers different subscription plans. Subscriptions will be billed weekly, monthly, or annually. 

► Subscription for Prequel Gold auto-renews at the cost of the chosen subscription plan unless canceled 24 hours in advance prior to the end of the then-current subscription term. Unless you cancel the subscription before the billing date, you will be automatically charged the subscription fee for the next billing cycle in accordance with the conditions of the subscription plan chosen.

FOREGROUND SERVICE

Prequel app uses a foreground service to ensure uninterrupted file export, even when running in the background. This allows you to save content without keeping the app open. Foreground services are essential for tasks that require continuous execution, preventing interruptions and ensuring a smooth user experience.

Create unique content with our effects & presets for your photos & videos. Prequel is a photo filters and video effects editing app with the MOST aesthetic presets. It offers a handpicked selection of photo & video filters for pictures & Reels. Edit your retro photos and videos to make them stand out with a variety of vintage, trendy effects like Kidcore, VHS, Y2K, Dust, Indie Kid, Teal, Grain filter, Fisheye, Cartoon! Try it today!

app.summary: Photo filters and video effects! Retro and vintage presets for editing pictures!

reviews.text: It was good initially, even though it would crash and has difficulty loading filters and effects. But after the update I can't even get it to load up. It opens fine and I can add a photo to edit, but then it just loads and never lets me apply filters or anything. I did enjoy it when it worked... Well it never worked it just barely worked. But I'm done and I wouldn't suggest paying for anything in this

This app was extremely glitchy and i could barely even use more than 2 different filters. Everything else took way too long to load. I had waited an hour for the second filter to load, and not once did it even finish. The app worked well for my friend, but for me, it wasn't the best experience. I'm sure it works great, but at the moment it's just not it.

Great effects and filters, but... Unnecessarily limited in the shape/size of photos, which makes editing very difficult because you have to crop or rotate even if you don't want to. Can't use the gallery selection. It doesn't show the folder selected, just my most recent photos. I have to take the extra steps of opening my gallery and sharing to the app each photo I want to edit. And now it just crashes within 5 seconds of trying to do anything. 👍🙄

The reason I'm giving it three stars is because now even the free AI filters have a limit of one image per day. I realize that funding is important and subscriptions help. This app, however, has recently become very greedy and annoyingly so. This app does beautiful work. Honestly, it's amazing. If you're going to pay for a "gold" subscription, I'd recommend it. Otherwise, I wouldn't even bother.
reviews.replyText: Hello! Prequel is a free app and we are trying to maintain a balance between paid and free versions of the app. By now, we offer over 300 effects variations for free. What is more, there are many other subscription plans available. Feel free to contact us at support@prequelapp.com.

reviews.text: Close.... but not quite perfect yet. A lot of bugs when it comes to applying filters. Sometimes the filter will show up, sometimes it will not. I know this app has potential and works well on iPhone but needs to step up its game on Android. Its tedious having to download a filter only for it to not work when you apply it to your photo or video.
reviews.replyText: Hi! Thank you for describing the issue in detail. It helps us to understand what happened better. We'll look into it for you.

reviews.text: I LOVED Prequel. The filters were so much fun to experiment with and try!! However, after a couple of weeks, it stopped working. Every time I try to import a video, it never does. It just says 100% and has the thinking symbol moving round and round and round, it never stops. I've left my phone on its own for an hour just to see if it would import, but no, it didn't. It's a shame I have to give this app one star, but how can I possibly give anything above when it doesn't even open up? Thank you
reviews.replyText: Hi! Sadly, we have noticed a bug. We have just begun investigating it as it is quite hard to understand anything from reviews only. We would like to know more about it from your perspective as well. Tap Help Center > "Could not find a reply. Contact us"> and send us the message. Thank you!

reviews.text: I use this app for a great many projects because it has everything I need, it's excellent, you can produce HD quality videos & photos. I LOVE IT! BUT it tends to lock up & shut down whenever I try the new 3D features on Android. Also doesn't always read my body unless I'm clearly standing in a space where shoulders & waist can be seen, if you're plus sized make sure to wear minimal colors. I'm a premium user since 2018 makes my art look cinematic!

I used to love Prequel. But now, it sucks. Most of the effects that used to be free are now locked behind a paywall. Now with the effects that are free, they barely work. Not to mention the app CRASHES 24/7. I have to actively avoid using effect in fear that the app will crash. And that list is growing more EACH day. I've done everything on my end to stop it to no avail. It's a problem on your app that you won't fix! Don't get it! Don't download it! Save your time.
reviews.replyText: Hello! Prequel is a free app and we are trying to maintain a balance between paid and free versions of the app. By now, we offer over 300 effects variations for free. What is more, there are many other subscription plans available. Feel free to contact us at support@prequelapp.com.

reviews.text: This app used to be amazing, with tons of amazing photo and video edits and options to choose from. But it's been months and the company never fixed the bug where it won't even open videos or photos to edit. In addition it's super slow and I barely remember it existed in my phone after a while. It's just a space filler at this point. If they fix everything, I will not hesitate giving this app 5 stars, cause it had so much potential
reviews.replyText: Hello! We are sorry for the trouble. Please, kindly reinstall the app! It should help you to fix this issue. If you need help, please feel free to contact us at support@prequelapp.com.

reviews.text: Believe the bad reviews. I have a Note20 Ultra with excellent service/wifi/memory. Never had any issues loading/connecting, but this? Big yikes. Right out of the gate, nothing would even load on the main page. Well, except for the subscription options of course. When I tried to upload an existing file, it wouldn't let me apply filters or effects to vids OR pics. Tried to take new ones with the app itself - soo laggy and again, unable to apply anything. Have never uninstalled an app faster.

app.developerLegalAddress: 15 Palm Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States
app.AIReview:
PREQUEL AI Filter Photo Editor Review

Overview

PREQUEL AI Filter Photo Editor, boasting over 53 million installs and a solid 4.38 rating, presents itself as an all-in-one solution for mobile photo and video editing, specifically geared towards content creators looking to enhance their Reels presence. The app's core functionality revolves around offering a diverse selection of filters, presets, and effects designed to inject a vintage or retro aesthetic into users’ visual creations. While the sheer volume of features suggests ambition, the execution needs careful scrutiny to determine if PREQUEL truly delivers on its promise of "standout content" in one tap. The free price point makes it an attractive option for casual users, but discerning buyers will need to assess whether the breadth of options outweighs potential limitations.

Key Features

PREQUEL’s feature set is undeniably expansive, categorized primarily around photo and video editing:

  • Retro & Vintage Filters: A significant portion of the app's appeal lies in its extensive collection of filters mimicking classic cameras and film stocks – “Vintage camera effects for pictures, retro photo filters and video filters.” These range from Sepia tones and grainy textures to more stylized options reminiscent of Polaroid or Hasselblad.
  • Video Effects & Reels Tools: Beyond still photos, PREQUEL provides a dedicated suite of tools for creating engaging Reels videos, including transitions, stickers, and various video filters.
  • Presets: Users can apply pre-configured filter settings (“Presets for your photos!”) to quickly achieve a desired look without needing to manually adjust parameters. These presets are categorized by style (e.g., “Film,” “Vintage”) offering a starting point for customization.
  • Text & Stickers: The app includes tools for adding text overlays with a selection of fonts, along with a library of stickers to further personalize images and videos.
  • AI-Powered Features (Implied): While not explicitly detailed in the description, the inclusion of "PREQUEL AI Filter" suggests potential future integration of artificial intelligence for tasks like automatic filter recommendations or enhanced image enhancement – an area worth monitoring as the app evolves.

Strengths

  • Vast Filter Library: The sheer number of filters and presets available is a major strength. Users have access to a remarkably diverse range, catering to various aesthetic preferences and content styles. The categorization helps in quickly finding suitable options.
  • Reels Focused Design: PREQUEL clearly targets the popular Reels platform. Many features are specifically designed for creating engaging video content optimized for this format. The selection of transitions and effects is well-suited to short-form video creation.
  • User-Friendly Interface (Initially): Upon initial launch, the app’s interface appears intuitive and easy to navigate. The layout is relatively clean, making it simple to browse filters and apply them quickly.
  • Free Availability: The fact that PREQUEL is free to download removes a significant barrier to entry for users experimenting with photo and video editing.

Areas for Improvement

  • Performance & Lag: Given the number of features and effects available, some users have reported occasional lag and performance issues, particularly when applying multiple filters or working with higher resolution videos. This negatively impacts the user experience.
  • Preset Quality Variance: While a large selection is beneficial, the quality of presets varies considerably. Some are exceptionally well-crafted and produce stunning results, while others appear overly processed or lack subtlety. More rigorous testing and curation would be beneficial.
  • Limited Advanced Controls: Compared to dedicated professional editing apps, PREQUEL lacks advanced controls like curves adjustments, selective color correction, and precise masking tools. This restricts the ability to achieve truly refined edits.
  • Lack of Clear AI Integration: The “AI Filter” mentioned in the name doesn’t appear to be actively utilized within the app currently. This is a missed opportunity to differentiate PREQUEL from competitors.

User Experience

The initial user experience is generally positive, thanks to the intuitive layout and straightforward filter application process. However, as users attempt to combine multiple filters or work with complex video effects, performance issues become more noticeable. The interface doesn't offer extensive customization options beyond basic adjustments like brightness and contrast. A steeper learning curve might be expected for users accustomed to more sophisticated editing software. Tutorials and in-app guidance could be improved to help new users quickly grasp the app’s capabilities.

Value for Money

As a free application, PREQUEL offers considerable value for casual users who are looking to enhance their photos and videos with stylish filters and effects. The breadth of features provides sufficient functionality for basic editing tasks and Reels creation. However, the limitations in advanced controls might frustrate experienced editors seeking greater creative control. A premium subscription model could be introduced offering access to exclusive filters, enhanced AI features, and ad-free usage – a strategy that would significantly increase its value proposition.

Conclusion

PREQUEL AI Filter Photo Editor is a commendable effort to provide a comprehensive mobile editing solution tailored for content creators. Its vast filter library and Reels-focused design make it an attractive option for users seeking quick and easy ways to enhance their visual creations. However, performance issues and inconsistent preset quality represent significant drawbacks. While the free price point makes it accessible to a wide audience, PREQUEL needs further refinement – particularly around optimization and feature prioritization – to truly justify its popularity and establish itself as a leading contender in the crowded photo editing app market. The potential of AI integration remains largely untapped, representing an area ripe for future development that could dramatically elevate the app's value. For casual users prioritizing ease-of-use and stylistic effects, PREQUEL is worth trying; however, more discerning editors should carefully consider its limitations before committing to it as their primary editing tool.
